insight

Gain insight into your models!

The goal of this package is to provide tools to help an easy, intuitive and consistent accesss to information contained in various models. Although there are generic functions to get information and data from models, many modelling-functions from different packages do not provide such methods to access these information. insight aims at closing this gap by providing functions that work for (almost) any model.

Documentation

Documentation and vignettes are available here.

Contributions

Hop aboard this package’s developpement by opening an issue or by contributing to the code.

Installation

Latest development build

To install the latest development snapshot (see latest changes below), type following commands into the R console:

library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("easystats/insight")

Official, stable release

Not yet on CRAN

Citation

insight can be cited as following:

foo, bar (2042).
